title: Yula font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me id these fonts used for Yula Corporation logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091108153258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/yulaheaderlogo2_4979.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: The “Yula” looks like Aachen and “CORPORATION” looks like Helvetica Expanded Black.

I actually work for Yula Corporation. I think that the Yula was originally just done in AutoCAD, but I don’t know what font was used for the outline. Please let me know why you need this and I can look into it further.
